ReportSpec.Name: Application User Matrix Report
ReportSpec.Description: A report showing information about application user and system roles records
ReportSpec.Author: Abel C. Debela

DataRetrieval.CreateSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_REPORT_APPLICATIONUSERMATRIX as select AU.ID as APPUSERID, AU.DISPLAYNAME , SR.ID as SYSTEMROLEID, SR.NAME from APPUSER AU LEFT JOIN SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER SRAU ON AU.ID = SRAU.APPUSERID LEFT JOIN SYSTEMROLE SR ON SRAU.SYSTEMROLEID = SR.ID ORDER BY AU.DISPLAYNAME COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_Cp437_BIN
